website_summaries.verdict: The excellent-sounding, elegant-looking Definitive Technology W Studio helps bring a touch of luxury to those willing to splash out on a high-end sound bar.
pros: The Definitive Technology W Studio sound bar offers superb sound in an elegant package
Its included 8-inch (20cm) subwoofer can really plumb the depths
It offers a rich mix of features including a full-size remote, HDMI switching Dolby and DTS decoding and the most stable implementation yet of Play-Fi lossless streaming
cons: some surround processing can still be heard on Play-Fi music, even with the processing turned off
and the Play-Fi setup isn't clear either

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, but needs 2017 update
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away by the sound the W Studio put out but ended up getting rid of it because of its lack of hdmi arc and 4K pass through. Dialogue is ultra clear and adjustable, and the bass is unreal. I don't think I'll ever be able to own a system with a tiny sub again. If you're okay with using two remotes and aren't concerned with 4K, I'd highly recommend this. But if you're like me, let me know if you find something that has those things and matches this sound quality! One final note: this soundbar is gorgeous, and looks great in a living room.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Pryor

customer_reviews.title: What a company!!!
customer_reviews.text: This setup works wonderfully and provides quality sound all around. If you like your sound loud, it may not be for you. But for normal levels, the base is great and the sound is awesome!!! Also the customer support is better than any other. I had an issue with my main bar after a couple weeks, and they sent me a replacement after they couldn't solve the issue over the phone. My dog ate my remote last week, I called them and they are in the process of sending me a replacement- NO CHARGE... not even Dish or anyone else does that!!! Buy it and you will NOT be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Haydock

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing. Bought the refurbished system. Bass will blow off you wig, while mids and highs are clear as a bell. Great for music (ADHD by Kendrick Lamarr played on this system will change your life) as well as movies. Surround effect is just OK but not a deal breaker by any means. Two main problems with the system is lack of 4K pass through, and no bluetooth. Otherwise I'd give it a perfect score. Set up while far from being rocket science, is a bit tricky.; Overall I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but easy to use and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've got to say I really do notice and love the sound quality coming out of this system. It's pricey... and probably too pricey for what it is... but if you can get a refurbished model or a good sale, I would more than recommend it. If you don't care about money, it's probably the nicest sounding sound bar I've ever owned. I was also surprised by how good the subwoofer sounds, given that it is wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Wickersty

customer_reviews.title: Under 5 years old and have to replace already
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in September 2015 and it's on the fritz. The sub-woofer is intermittently cutting out, which is becoming bothersome. I called the manufacturer and was informed the warranty was good only for 1 year on this product. Their stated 5 year warranty only covers their tower speakers. Since I'll be replacing this product, I'll upgrade to latest technology with better warranty coverage. I was always pleased with the sound quality, and it sounds awesome for a bar/sub combo. Too bad I have to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Luthon

customer_reviews.title: Buy on sale
customer_reviews.text: I waited for this to go on sale and am very happy with the purchase. The original price tag is what it's worth but, on sale...it's a super deal. Very easy to hook up and operate. The sound is awesome compared to a regular sound bar or surround system. The only downer is the lack of the ARC function. If you don't know what that is, you'll never miss it. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denonier

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sound bar/sub! Far superior to the highly rated Visio sound bar/sub I had. The voices are far more natural and clear, in all fairness, this one cost 5 times as much as the Visio, but, music is beautifully reproduced, and the bass is fantastic through the wireless sub. I can listen to this system for hours and don’t get the ear fatigue like I used to get.
customer_reviews.author: Ezgoin

customer_reviews.title: This was a great refurbished product!
customer_reviews.text: I got very lucky with finding this product as most of these retail and 1200s. Sell for the price that I got this speaker system at and the performance, since I got this at a very amazing price and I’m very long
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Bergevin

customer_reviews.title: I'm no audiophile but....
customer_reviews.text: The sound that comes from this unit is the best I've heard from a sound bar. However, the sub-woofer is not as strong.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Ear-Pleasing
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used any of the app's functions nor am I likely to, but as a pure sonic experience this thing exceeded my expectations. I would consider myself pretty picky when it comes to sound and even if these aren't perfect (they probably aren't the best for pure stereo imaging and the sub can be a but muddy at times), they are just so damn pleasing to listen to I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Wendel

customer_reviews.title: otherwise the sound syst m is pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Remote is very flimsy...otherwise the sound system is pretty good...slightly pricy. You should compare a Bose as well...
customer_reviews.author: Syed F. Jalal

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We went from a wired system in our old house to this in our new house. This system sounds just as good and way easier to set up!
customer_reviews.author: az_contemporary

customer_reviews.title: Loving My Bar
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever made! Sound is on point, classy design and the woofer has me wondering sometimes if I'm alone.
customer_reviews.author: tbd4life

customer_reviews.title: Great for Movies, so-so for music.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar works very well for movies and decent for music. I upgraded from a Polk Audio Surround 3000 sound bar and it was just as good for music, if not slightly better, than the Studio W. But for movies, the Studio W blows it away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for a traditional surround sound system
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. Recently downsized to a condo and I sold my B&W 600 series surround system and replaced it with the W studio. This setup handles all our entertainment needs with a small footprint. And no tangle of cables.
customer_reviews.author: John LaCroix Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Tried others sound bast including Polk and Bose, sound quality is so much better
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stoloff

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - some cons
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for a soundbar with amazing sound, look no more. I've been blown away by the sound quality. Cons - app is problematic. It's needs improvements is an understatement. The remote is cheap. Dropped it once and the thing shattered in 10 pieces. If they can improve this, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, works out wheel as a small room system attached to a TV
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, works out wheel as a small room system attached to a TV
customer_reviews.author: Not You

customer_reviews.title: I liked that the remote allowed for adjustment to the center ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the remote allowed for adjustment to the center speaker and subwoofer, but when I compared this soundbar to the Sonos sounbdar, I found the sound quality of the Sonos to be slightly better. I also like that I can get rear speakers for the Sonos.
customer_reviews.author: Brian 'Welch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality but app sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is a great soundbar with superb sound quality. However, the app left me feeling a little underwhelmed. The app does not stream music consistently. the sound comes in and out periodically over the course of a song which gets irritating very fast. considering the amount of money I send for this soundbar I was disappointed with app.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound , hate the app
customer_reviews.text: Love the system , hate the app . You can only steam approved third party apps through the system (I.e.- spotify, Pandora)
customer_reviews.author: Technical T

customer_reviews.title: For what they are - a sound bar - very solid performance.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these speakers for the price and for being a sound bar provide an impressive and immersive experience. But I don't care what anyone says or claims, they fail to provide every close of a sound stage like separates do.
customer_reviews.author: James Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I returned it was inoperative but it looked very well made, so I really should not rate it.
customer_reviews.author: jack tar

customer_reviews.title: sub started to turn off
customer_reviews.text: The product was working properly for one month. After that, the sub started to turn off in the middle of the music, movie or whatever is playing, and the sound starts being without bass. I have to contact Defective, ops...Definitive Technology for support because after one month, I cannot complain anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worse interfacefor a sound
customer_reviews.text: not what I expected from DT, worse interfacefor a sound bar
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Failing to power up after 3 months is unacceptable - no matter how good it may sound.
customer_reviews.text: If only it worked for more than 3 months. I purchased this in January and after it's quick arrival, it was setup with new curved TV via clean power and the two worked fantastic together. After a few months - and conveniently just after the amazon support window closed - the product ceased working while the family was watching a movie. It simply will not power up. Nothing. Nada. Now it appears we are out $1k. Performance would earn 5 stars, but breaking so soon after purchasing and now having to face going to the manufacturer, I simply cannot recommend this unit. Should DT resolve the situation timely and with zero out of pocket, I'll happily change the review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Bad HDMI port
customer_reviews.text: So far I really enjoy the sound quality, but I think the HDMI 1 port (there are only 3 output ports) is not working. I need to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Hyperping

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound, some decoloracion on the finish Of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible sound, some decoloracion on the finish Of the sound bar. Lots of damages on the package. Of previous returns.
customer_reviews.author: gregorio j freyre

product_meta.title: Definitive Technology W Studio Sound Bar System with Wireless Streaming, Black (Renewed)
product_meta.description: Model:W-STUDIO-Certified RefurbishedDefinitive Technology W Studio Sound Bar System with Wireless Streaming, Black (Certified Refurbished)
feature_bullets: This Certified Refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, a minimum 90-day warranty, and may arrive in a generic box. Only select sellers who maintain a high performance bar may offer Certified Refurbished products on Amazon.com.

Room-Filling 5.1 Channel Surround Sound - The W Studio sound bar is built with three aluminum dome tweeters and six full range mid-woofers. The included wireless subwoofer completes this home theater system. Amazing surround sound with easy setup and premium build quality.

Works with Virtually Any TV - Three HDMI, One Optical, and a 3.5 millimeter AUX input gives flexibility to connect Blu-Ray players, Cable/Satellite boxes, gaming consoles and streaming players directly to the sound bar and output to the TV. Use the Remote Control learning ability to control the W Studio with your TV, Cable/Satellite, or Universal Remote Control.

Easy Setup and Elegant Style - Choose how you want to connect to your TV (HDMI or Optical) and simply plug the sound bar and subwoofer into power. The sound bar and subwoofer are paired at the factory so no setup is needed. The sound bar can be placed on a tabletop or wall mounted with the included hardware. Purposefully slim design, solid aircraft grade aluminum, and obsession over every detail make this sound bar a show piece for any home.

Sound Bar System with Wireless Streaming - The W Studio sound bar system is Definitive Technology’s flagshipwireless soundbar that perfectly blends high-performance theater soundwith hi-resolution musical reproduction. The W Studio’s purposefullyslim design (only 3.5” deep) is only overshadowed by its fit and finish,featuring solid aluminum end caps. The W Studio uses DefinitiveTechnology’s proprietary Spatial Array technology that aids in creatinga high-definition, room-filling 5.1 channel surround sound experience.The compact wireless subwoofer creates waves of big bass via itsdownward firing 8-inch woofer, bass port and robust 200 Watt amplifier.HDMI switching for both audio and video maximizes this home theater’shigh performance potential.

Definitive Technology Apps - The free Definitive Technology App allows you to mix-and-match speakerswith the open DTS Play-Fi Technology standard and future-proof your home musicsolution. The Definitive Technology Utility App provides extended functionality,including product firmware updates, source selection (if applicable) and EQsettings for the W Amp and W Adapt.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars75 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
